mapper.select: select * from boxTreasureUser where toUserId=#{userId} and gainType=#{gainType} and createTime>#{createTime} and hadGet=0 group by boxId
select * from boxTreasureFamily where toFamilyId=#{familyId} and gainType=#{gainType} and daystamp=#{daystamp} and hadGet=0 group by boxId
select * from boxTreasureFamily where toFamilyId=#{familyId} and gainType=#{gainType} and daystamp=#{daystamp} and hadGet=0 order by componentId
select count(1) from boxTreasureFamily where toFamilyId=#{familyId} and gainType=1 and daystamp=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d') and hadGet=0
select count(1) from boxTreasureFamily where toFamilyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
mapper.update: update boxTreasureUser set receiveTime=now(),hadGet=1 where boxId=#{boxId}
update boxTreasureFamily set receiveTime=now(),hadGet=1 where boxId=#{boxId}
